name: Kids Cake Pop Cooking
description:
Welcome to Sherry Desserts Studio!
Today we have various cooking classes to teach everyone to make the most popular cake pops! Such as rainbow cake pops, classic cake pops, and my favorite rose cake pops! Do you want to know how to make these amazing cake pops? Alright! Just come with me! Let's get start right now!

Product Features:
-A super fun food-making game
-Make yummy cake pops
-Three kinds of cake pops to make: classic cake pop, rainbow cake pop and flower cake pop
-Tons of realistic cooking tools to play: bowl, spatula, mixer, cake pop maker, sticks, freezer, induction cooker, spoon, pan, cutting board, rolling pin, shape cutter and so much more
-Tons of food materials and decorations to try: eggs, chocolate, sprinkles, candies, fruits, sticks, flour and so much more

How to play:
- Use interactive controls to play the game
- Take different courses for classic cake pop, rainbow cake pop and flower cake pop
- Try different tools to make your foods
- Mix various ingredients to create the unique flavor and color of your foods
- Decorate your foods with beautiful sprinkles, candies, fruits and cream toppings
